about_the_game:
Welcome to Fate of Stars, a PvP auto-battler collectible game with unique inventory management mechanics! Collect heroes, craft powerful items, and battle other players in strategic duels!

Game Modes




Normal - choose your hero, get 2 random pets and battle other players
Arena - choose one of 3 random heroes, get 2 random pets, add challenge tokens and battle other players for the best reward
Tournament - regular automated tournaments for rewards and glory
1 VS 1 - play with your friends in 1 vs 1 battles
Adventure - short stories with PvE battles
Challenges - PvE boss battles

Normal and Arena modes will be available at the beginning of Early Access.

Collect heroes




Choose a hero to battle other players. In the early access, 2 heroes and 10 pets will be available. In the full version of the game, we plan to add more than 20 heroes and 30 pets. Unlock new heroes and pets by winning battles.

Collect & Craft Powerful Items




Buy and create powerful items in the forge, assemble unique builds from them and win! Your victory depends on what items you get and how you place them. More than 100 basic items and more than 20 crafted ones are available in the early access version.

Battle other Players




Fight other players in different modes, come up with new builds or study your opponents' builds. As a reward, you will receive loot and a place in the ranking!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
